department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify, for high voltage maintenance at the Esquimalt Graving Dock, Victoria, BC.
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Phase 2: High Voltage Maintenance
#### Esquimalt Graving Dock, Victoria, BC

**Reference Number:** WS3763228051\
**Publication Date:** December 12, 2022\
**Closing Date:** January 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)

**Contract Overview:**
This solicitation represents the second phase of the high voltage maintenance project, taking place at the Esquimalt Graving Dock in Victoria, British Columbia. Background research and analysis conducted during Phase 1 have identified the specific needs and requirements for the second phase of maintenance operations.

**Scope of Work:**
* Electrical Equipment and Components and Supplies (UNSPSC Code: 39120000)
* Electric Power System Construction Service (UNSPSC Code: 72151502)
* Electronic Controls Installation Service (UNSPSC Code: 72151507)
* Electrical Equipment Maintenance and Repair Service (UNSPSC Code: 73152108)

**Important Date Information:**

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 13, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 10, 2023

**Government Tendering Details:**
* **Invitation Type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity Information:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Donna Fung (SPAC/PSPC)
Donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please note that all details in the tender announcement are provided in both English and French.

Feel free to reach out to me if you'd like me to rephrase anything else!
